meanings.definition: A gymnastic movement in which the body is rotated sideways around the hands.
meanings.sent1: During the gymnastics competition, Sarah performed a perfect cartwheel.
meanings.sent2: Children often practice cartwheels in the park.
meanings.sent3: The clown attempted a cartwheel but ended up falling comically.
meanings.sent4: Her joy made her heart cartwheel with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The cartwheel was so graceful, it mesmerized the audience.

meanings.definition: A horizontal wheel with a handle, used for transporting small loads.
meanings.sent1: The gardener used a cartwheel to move the heavy bags of soil.
meanings.sent2: The cartwheel on the wheelbarrow made it easier to push.
meanings.sent3: The cartwheel squeaked as it rolled down the path, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The cartwheel of the wheelbarrow spun smoothly, carrying the harvest.
meanings.sent5: The rusty cartwheel added character to the old wheelbarrow.
